rule.name: package_unique_constraint
rule.algorithm: local p : bag of physical_unit := query ( r <* package | ( r . frame_of_reference . name = 'physical design usage' ) ) ; pu : bag of physical_unit ; pd_bag : bag of property_definition ; pdr_bag : bag of property_definition_representation ; pass : boolean := true ; r_bag : bag of representation := [ ] ; end_local ; pu := p ; repeat i := 1 to sizeof ( pu ) by 1 ; if ( not pass ) then escape ; end_if ; pd_bag := usedin ( pu [ i ] , 'package_mim.' + 'property_definition.definition' ) ; repeat j := 1 to sizeof ( pd_bag ) by 1 ; if ( not pass ) then escape ; end_if ; pdr_bag := query ( pdr <* usedin ( pd_bag [ j ] , 'package_mim.' + 'property_definition_representation.definition' ) | ( pdr . used_representation \ representation . name = 'registered case style' ) ) ; repeat k := 1 to sizeof ( pdr_bag ) by 1 ; if exists ( pdr_bag [ k ] . used_representation ) then if ( pdr_bag [ k ] . used_representation in r_bag ) then pass := false ; escape ; else r_bag := r_bag + pdr_bag [ k ] . used_representation ; end_if ; end_if ; end_repeat ; end_repeat ; end_repeat ;

where.label: wr1
where.expression: pass

where.label: wr1
